languages.text: "Кто же теперь станет новым маршалом Простора? Полагаю, после боя в суде кандидатов осталось не так много..."
languages.translation_comment: The RT ordered the Arbites to find a new Marshal, but did not choose Solomorne.

traits.locale_text: "Кто же теперь станет новым маршалом Простора? Полагаю, после боя в суде кандидатов осталось не так много..."

languages.text: "Who will become the new Marshal of the Expanse? I assume the number of candidates has dwindled after the battle in court..."
languages.translation_comment: The RT ordered the Arbites to find a new Marshal, but did not choose Solomorne.

languages.text: 「エクスパンスの新たな将帥になられるのはどなたなのでしょう？法廷での戦いの後では、候補者の数もずいぶん減ったのでしょうね…」
languages.original_text: "Who will become the new Marshal of the Expanse? I assume the number of candidates has dwindled after the battle in court..."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスの新たな将帥になられるのはどなたなのでしょう？法廷での戦いの後では、候補者の数もずいぶん減ったのでしょうね…」

languages.text: "Wer wird zum neuen Marschall der Ausdehnung? Ich nehme an, die Zahl der Kandidaten ist nach dem Kampf im Gericht deutlich geschrumpft ..."
languages.original_text: "Who will become the new Marshal of the Expanse? I assume the number of candidates has dwindled after the battle in court..."

traits.locale_text: "Wer wird zum neuen Marschall der Ausdehnung? Ich nehme an, die Zahl der Kandidaten ist nach dem Kampf im Gericht deutlich geschrumpft ..."

languages.text: « Qui assumera le rôle de maréchal des Étendues ? Après ce combat au tribunal, j'imagine que le nombre de candidats a considérablement diminué... »
languages.original_text: "Who will become the new Marshal of the Expanse? I assume the number of candidates has dwindled after the battle in court..."

traits.locale_text: « Qui assumera le rôle de maréchal des Étendues ? Après ce combat au tribunal, j'imagine que le nombre de candidats a considérablement diminué... »

languages.text: «¿Quién será el nuevo mariscal de la Extensión? Supongo que el número de candidatos ha disminuido después de esa batalla en el juzgado...».
languages.original_text: "Who will become the new Marshal of the Expanse? I assume the number of candidates has dwindled after the battle in court..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién será el nuevo mariscal de la Extensión? Supongo que el número de candidatos ha disminuido después de esa batalla en el juzgado...».

languages.text: “谁会成为科罗努斯扩区的新任元帅呢？这场大战结束之后，候选人的数量恐怕也少了很多……”
languages.original_text: "Who will become the new Marshal of the Expanse? I assume the number of candidates has dwindled after the battle in court..."

languages.text: "Yeni Enginlik Miralayı kim olacak acaba? Savaştan sonra aday sayısı azalmış olsa gerek."
